metadata.title: CVE-2023-3128 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Grafana is validating Azure AD accounts based on the email claim. On AzureAD, the profile email field is not unique and can be easily modified. Thisleads to account takeover and authentication bypass when Azure AD OAuth isconfigured with a multi-tenant app.

criterions.comment: grafana package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
